page.title: 10FARMING IN DIPTON.
page.content: {OUR FARM by SUZANNE BLACKWOOD. } {Type}_ Mixed;{Size,}560acres; {Spring Jobs;}Lambing,Fencing,Rolling, Fertilizing,Chain Harrowing,Planting, Worming of Beasts,Dehorning of Calves {Summer Jobs;}Hay stacked in byres and crops harvested after August,Silage gathered;Lambs seperated from ewes. {Autumn Jobs;}All land prepared for winter cereals;Calves seperated from cows in October.Potatoes & Turnips picked. {Winter Jobs;}Barley & Wheat sown,The Cattle are brought in for winter. {Diseases.}Twin Lamb Disease killed 42 lambs in 1985. {Breeds of Beasts;}Cows _Limousin Cross Hereford,Charolais,& Black Galloway for Beef;Total 200.Ewes _Swaeldale, Mules,Jacobs,&Scottish Blackface =204 6 Rams,3Suffolk,Dorset,Jacob,Leicester 2 Fulltime men plus occasional help.
